alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon; Northumberland; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:50PM EDT until July 29 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... North central Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... South central Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Klingerstown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Schuylkill Haven, Pine Grove, Lykens, Tremont, Williamstown, Tower City, Friedensburg, Donaldson, Klingerstown, Urban, Lake Wynonah and Cressona. This includes Interstate 81 from mile markers 95 to 111. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
